what bout rk's?: i'm sure most rootkits would be detectable by running md5's on the basic binaries used by ubuntu and comparing them to know good values
what about rks that dont attatch to the .deb files, but wind up piggybacking on a packet/file sent to your comp over the net?
that would require manually executing, as root, a file that you downloaded from an untrusted source on the internet.
